Package com.mhealthatlas.usermanagement.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,​java.util.UUID>
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,​java.util.UUID>
Contains methods to interact with the database.
The query annotations uses the entity classes defined in User. Standart actions like save and findAllById are automatically generated.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<User> findAbonnements()
    Finds user with the role "Subscriber"
    java.util.List<User> findUnValidatedExperts()
    Finds experts with not validated specializations.
    java.util.List<User> findValidatedExperts()
    Finds experts with a validated specializations.

    Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

    count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findById, save

    Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository

    deleteAllInBatch, deleteInBatch, findAll, findAll, findAll, findAll, findAllById, flush, getOne, saveAll, saveAndFlush

    Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository

    findAll

    Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor

    count, exists, findAll, findOne

  • Method Details

    • findAbonnements

      @Query("select distinct u from User u join u.roles ur where ur.roleType = \'Subscriber\'") java.util.List<User> findAbonnements()
      Finds user with the role "Subscriber"
      Returns:
      the found subscribers

    • findValidatedExperts

      @Query("select us.user from UserSpecialization us where us.specializationValidated = true") java.util.List<User> findValidatedExperts()
      Finds experts with a validated specializations.
      Returns:
      the found validated experts

    • findUnValidatedExperts

      @Query("select us.user from UserSpecialization us where us.specializationValidated = false") java.util.List<User> findUnValidatedExperts()
      Finds experts with not validated specializations.
      Returns:
      the found validated experts
